de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database

Class DbControlFlow

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbObject
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbControlFlow

  • public class DbControlFlow
extends DbObject
    Represents the ControlFlow in the database. Mostly used to get predecessors and successors of a controlNode.

      DbControlFlow()

    • Method Detail

      • getNextControlNodeAfterStartEvent

        public int getNextControlNodeAfterStartEvent(int controlNode_id)
        This method returns the database Id of the first controlNode after the startEvent.
        Parameters:
        controlNode_id - This is the database ID of a controlNode.
        Returns:
        -1 if something went wrong else it returns the database ID of a controlNode which is right after a startEvent.

      • getFollowingControlNodes

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getFollowingControlNodes(int controlNode_id)
        This method returns all database ID's of all controlNodes succeeding the given controlNode.
        Parameters:
        controlNode_id - This is the database ID of a controlNode.
        Returns:
        a list of database ID's of controlNodes which succeed the given controlNode.

      • getPredecessorControlNodes

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getPredecessorControlNodes(int controlNode_id)
        This method returns all database ID's of all controlNodes preceding the given controlNode.
        Parameters:
        controlNode_id - This is the database ID of a controlNode.
        Returns:
        a list of database ID's of controlNodes which precede the given controlNode.

      • getConditions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getConditions(int controlNode_id)
        This method returns all database ID's of all controlNodes and the conditions preceding the given controlNode.
        Parameters:
        controlNode_id - This is the database ID of a controlNode.
        Returns:
        a map of database ID's of controlNodes and conditions which precede the given controlNode.
